name: There Are Cats
description:
Cats have gotten into your bunker and it's time to clean them out!

When you clear out rooms, sometimes a modifier will spawn by the entrance. After you pick it up, you can see what it does by hovering your mouse over it on the left side of the screen.

Please report any bugs/feedback in the comments or @ mention us on Twitter. Thank you for playing!

WARNING: This game depicts cats exploding into bloody chunks.

Controls The Game

This game was made by Ben Pence (twitter) in Unity and Blender over June 4-18, 2022 for Funni Jam 2. Ain't that a hoot!
